title: How do I search only specific folders when using the bookmarks searchbar?
content: Whenever I use the searchbar in the bookmarks manager, it always searches all of my bookmarks, but sometimes I might only want to search for that query within a specific folder. Is there any way to limit a bookmarks search to only a specific folder rather than the entirety of my bookmarks?
creator: tfaholic09

title: Mozilla non funziona
content: Buongiorno, da qualche giorno mozilla non funziona su due dispositivi mac diversi. E' lento fino ad essere inutilizzabile. Non riconosce il proxy e non riusciamo a fare nulla. Non è un problema del singolo computer perché è uguale anche nell'altro. Cosa si può fare? Grazie Luisa
creator: lfrizziero

title: Firefox Home search results not open in new tab?
content: The "Firefox Home" search results always open in new tab. How can I set it showing in current tab?
creator: darkj2k

title: Cannot mute any video/audio player on any website in firefox, also attempting to mute a tab has no effect on audio, which continues to play
content: Cannot mute any video/audio player on any website in Firefox, also attempting to mute a tab has no effect on audio, which continues to play. For example the audio controls on YouTube do not function. Attempting to lower the volume does not work, nor does attempting to mute the player. I also experience this on Twitter and Twitch as well as any other website I visit to consume video or audio media. This issue is exclusive to Firefox on my system and is not present it Chrome or other Chromium based browsers.
creator: dimike96

title: I need help regarding Firefox Non Secure alert on SSL Pages
content:
Hi, Firefox support,

I need help regarding a website https://kidscareclub.com when I browse this site on my desktop firefox browser it shows not secure alert on the top left corner on the lock icon. But it's working fine in other browsers like chrome safari etc.

Another problem is that some of the pages of this website still opening with SSL in firefox mobile. Can you help me please because I have to submit my information on this website?
creator: normarharris209

title: Bir de bununla deneyin önerisinden kurtulmak istiyorum
content: Çoğu zaman her formattan sonra %50 şansla olmak suretiyle firefox kurduğumda arama önerilerinin altında bir de şununla deneyin tarzındaki önerilerden kurtuluyordum fakat yine karşıma çıktı. Ben sadece arama çubuğunda geçmişimdeki arama önerileri kalsın istiyorum. Ayarlardan önerileri kapatsam bile Bir de şununla deneyin yazısı ve yer imleri vs simgelerinin olduğu ek bir çubuk daha en alta çıkıyor. Bundan kurtulmak istiyorum.
creator: exel_bugra

title: Firefox deletes cookie history
content: I have researched this site, looked up several articles,but the bottomline is that Firefox updated my browser without my permission and deleted my bookmarked and cookie history. I will no longer used this browser after 9 years. BEWARE
creator: jim.rapson

title: How to change the background color and text color of the URL search bar?
content:
I recently installed a theme that I really like, but the search bar by default is a blinding white color and it contrasts heavily with the dark blue colors in the theme I picked.

Is there a way for me to edit the background color and text color of the search bar to be a different color? I've tried looking at different solutions and most of them make reference to userchrome or something else I have absolutely no idea how to work. Can someone explain to me, in the most simple and hard to get wrong terms as humanly possible, how to change the background and text color in the search bar? Is this something I edit the theme itself for? How do I do that?

Thanks in advance. Attached image shows the part of the browser I'm talking about if it somehow wasn't clear enough. I'd like to turn the white color into, say, dark blue or gray, and change the text color to a light blue or white.
creator: wuirgwuighoifmqewfieqg

title: I cannot access my gmail account.
content: Tell me why. It used to work but now it don't.
creator: rjfrech

title: Youtube loads slow
content: Youtube loads at a throttled bandwidth, however I don't encounter this issue with any other website, or safari. I am about to switch to another browser, which would suck since I love firefox. What can I do?
creator: Bonh

title: text edit button
content:
I have been unsuccessful in finding a solution in searches, so posting here. On one website I use, a machining forum, when I want to reply to a post, I have no text edit options ie bold, italic, emojis, etc. They are there, but grayed. They have worked previously for me. I don't know what changed like a setting on my part or an upgrade. I currently run Firefox version 99.01. I asked on the forum and other users have the same version and no problems. I can access the page with Chrome and on my phone (Android) and no problem so it is not my account. And on other forums, I ie different websites, I can use those functions. I have removed history cache and cookies, restarted Firefox and restarted the laptop.

Any suggestions?
creator: sdonohue

title: Can't add bookmarks after restoring computer
content:
Hi!

The other day I did a clean install of windows on my computer. When I did it, I was able to follow the instructions to refresh Firefox (which gave me the old firefox data folder) that was a great help to keep my bookmarks and passwords. Now, the problem is that I can't add any new bookmarks. When I try to click on the bookmark button nothing happens. I tried following a few troubleshooting threads (this one for example: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/cant-add-change-or-save-bookmarks) but it didn't work.

Any help would be greatly appreciated!

Thanks in advance!
creator: hugogperras

title: Missing Content Security Policy enable/disable setting on about:config
content:
Hello,

I noticed that a setting on the about:config page was removed: the "security.csp.enable" setting. I was using this setting to disable CSP to be able to load local JS scripts on some non-locally hosted sites, for debugging and development, work related purposes.

Was this setting really removed? Is there a way to disable CSP on Firefox on the latest version?

Thanks! Gabriel.
creator: gabrielmuttiteixeira

title: Malwarebytes website
content:
I have been trying to get on the Malwarebytes website, but I keep getting;

Your connection is not secure

The owner of links.malwarebytes.com has configured their website improperly. To protect your information from being stolen, Firefox has not connected to this website.

links.malwarebytes.com uses an invalid security certificate. The certificate is only valid for the following names: *.fortinet.com, fortinet.com Error code: SSL_ERROR_BAD_CERT_DOMAIN


This happens with all of my web browsers. Is it safe to allow Fortinet ?
creator: fredmcd-hotmail

title: Facebook won't load in a container tab.
content:
I just updated my Mac to OS 12.3.1 (from Big Sur). I did a clean install of the OS, but used Migration Assistant for all of my applications and settings. For some reason, all of my Firefox Add-Ons disappeared, for whatever that's worth.

The issue I'm having is that Facebook won't load in a container page. I don't have the Facebook Container Add-On installed, I'm only using the Firefox native container settings.

FB does load in Banking or Shopping container tabs, but not in a Facebook container tab. The log in page loads, and the 2 factor authorization page, but once I get past that, I see nothing but a white page.

Instagram loads just fine in a Facebook container, though. Banking and Shopping containers seem to be working fine otherwise, too.

Any advice or suggestions would be appreciated, thanks.
creator: ivan.rhudick

title: Unable to Access Washington Post
content: I can no longer access The Washington Post using Firefox even though I have a subscription. The website pops up for a minute and then disappears. I have done a search for help with this problem, but I've not found a solution. This doesn't happen with any other site. Any suggestions for how to remedy this problem?
creator: diane.franklin
